IP_SYN_1_var_3:
Procedures Performed:
1. EBUS with TBNA (31652): Station 4R sampled.
2. Bronchoscopy with biopsy, single lobe (31628): LUL nodule biopsied.
3. Radial EBUS (31654): Peripheral lesion localization.
4. Additional biopsies (31632 x2): Research samples in RUL and RML.
Note: LMA used. 4R sampled due to size >5mm. LUL nodule visualized with rEBUS (eccentric). Multiple tools used.
